Name: CLEARWORLD
About the game: CLEARWORLD is a visual novel produced by TOEI ANIMATION CO., LTD and Plus81. It has beautiful artwork, music and Japanese voice, with complete Chinese. Guide the story by making decisions at key points of the narrative. The future is up to you. Introduction： Upon finding a new energy source that is seemingly inexhaustible, humanity creates 11 utopian cities within the span of 10 years. Only a chosen few are able to live in these cities, with those denied entry living out unchanged lives outside, but with their eyes ever turned toward these cities. The game is set in 2047, inside one such city, the titular 'Clear World,' a bastion of science and intellect nestled beneath the waves. The story centers on Mito Gionji, who holds no special love or favor for Clear World. He helps out in his uncle's private investigation agency. When he takes a request to find a particular person, it takes him to a dimly lit warehouse in the city's harbor, where he meets a mysterious girl. Features： Visual novel This is a visual novel, you can click on the mouse to play this game. Make your choice Guide the story by making decisions at key points of the narrative. The future is up to you. Gameplay： CLEARWORLD Phi is a visual novel（full voice）, containing Science Fiction content, you can click the mouse to play this game.
